note.value: The text of this section of the palimpsest presents many differences from the Assemani edition; references to the Assemani edition do not always have a precise equivalent. The missing text between fols. 173v and 180r (Assemani 47 F 4-48 F 6) must have occupied the central bifolio of the quire
